group_1.textLeft: You've returned, Master.

group_1.textRight: Welcome home, Master♪

group_1.narration: The store we went to was a maid cafe,@and I met the store's two signature maids, @Nagitan and Ikumin, AKA Kanagi and Ikumi.

group_1.textRight: Oh wow...a ketchup heart on the omelet... @It's so adorable!

group_1.textLeft: I tried to fill it with every itty bitty bit @of my love!
Your order.

group_1.textRight: Dang, looks great! @A thick and tasty-lookin' omelet!

group_1.textLeft: It has no love put into it, but it was made with @great effort. You have my word that it's delicious.

group_1.textRight: ...She's kind of a weird maid. Not that I mind.

group_1.textCenter: I'm glad to please you, Master.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...C'mon, be serious!@Don't play with a girl's heart like that!

group_1.textCenter: Serious...? I can assure you I'm always serious.
(We've come to quite the place, huh...)

group_1.textRight: Hey, I don't think I've seen you around @here before.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, erm... Are you a maid?

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, no, I'm just a customer. @The name’s Ryo.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'm sorry... I'm Iroha Tamaki.
I came here with a friend of mine, @so it's my first time...

group_1.textRight: I see. These kinds of places can make people @feel awkward when they first visit.

group_1.textLeft: Ryo... Do you come here often?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. Photography's a hobby of mine, @and I often take pictures here.

group_1.textLeft: You've been super helpful taking photos @for our blog!

group_1.textRight: I'm glad I can help.

group_1.textLeft: Photos for your blog...?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...you mind if I tell you a bit about myself?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, go ahead...!

group_1.textRight: I've always had a knack for encountering @rare and unexpected things.
I started bringing this camera with me @everywhere I went to snap evidence,
but I could never get a photo in time.
I was struggling with that when I visited @this maid cafe.
Long story short, Ikumi roped me into taking @photos to help promote the cafe,
and that's how I learned that these are @the kinds of photos I want to take.
See this one for example… It's a little blurry, @but isn't that a winning smile?

group_1.textLeft: You’re right... She looks so happy!
So you like taking pictures of smiles?

group_1.textRight: That's one part of it, but every smile's @got something going on behind it.
Take those two, for instance…@Kanagi and Ikumi.
You don't see it, but they both work @incredibly hard.
Kanagi's working to keep her family afloat,@since her dad is injured.
Meanwhile, the place Ikumi and her coworkers @used to work at went out of business…
So she's working hard to keep this cafe @running for them.
And that's all while juggling her own dream @of becoming an idol.

group_1.textLeft: Wow...that's amazing!

group_1.textRight: Uh-oh! Someone’s being naaaughty. @No talking about Kumi's struggles!
Kumi is happy from tip to toe @to be working here♪

group_1.textLeft: (Happiness, huh...)
Oh wow...these sweets are so delicious, @I'm over the moon...

group_1.textRight: Here's another one for you, Moka.

group_1.textLeft: *Munch* Mmm... This is so heavenly...
I-it's so delicious, like...@[chara:304201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304201:cheek_0][chara:304201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:304201:lipSynch_1]Mmmmm…! I don't even know what!

group_1.textRight: You've got this, Meguru!
You're one step closer to improving @your food review skills!

group_1.textLeft: Urrrrrggghh...@[chara:304201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304201:eyeClose_1][chara:304201:lipSynch_1]It's delicious!!

group_1.textRight: Of course it is! Ahaha!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Here, you guys, have a drink!
The pure prowess behind this collab product... @Impossible! Could "THEY" have infiltrated...?!

group_1.textRight: Uh, um... Er, Rui... I don't think I can...
I heard about this maid cafe collaboration, @and I'm glad I went...
But this place is so amazing, it's putting @my leg fetish into overdrive!

group_1.textLeft: Gah! Miyuri, you mustn't faint... @Stay strong...!

group_1.textRight: *Swoon*

group_1.textLeft: ...She's fainted with a smile on her face...?

group_1.textCenter: Oh, phooey, who said that?! @Who called me old-fashioned?

group_1.narration: While spending time at the maid cafe, @I saw the happiness of a lot of people.
It took many different forms, @but everyone was smiling.@I could see they were all happy in Ryo's photos,@and I realized happiness comes in many forms.

group_1.textLeft: Everyone here seems really happy.

group_1.textRight: I know, right? It's a nice place to be.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]*Gasp* Oh!

group_1.textRight: Hm? What's up?

group_1.textLeft: I forgot I needed to do some shopping!

group_1.textRight: My oh my... Well, I'll see you around.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, see you again!
